Monster.Name: Swarm of Flies
Monster.des: A swarm of bugs moves in unison toward you.

Monster.Name: Massive Beetle
Monster.des: A huge beetle with a hardened carapace.

Monster.Name: Cobra
Monster.des: A small agile snake hisses and flicks its tongue.

Monster.Name: Very Large Mosquito
Monster.des: A mosquito the size of your head buzzes angrily at you.

Monster.Name: Giant Rat
Monster.des: A huge greasy rat. Gross!

Monster.Name: Falcon
Monster.des: A bird of prey swoops to attack from above.

Monster.Name: Wild Dog
Monster.des: A mangy dog foaming at the mouth.

Monster.Name: Large Coyote
Monster.des: A large gray coyote raises its haunches and prepares to attack.

Monster.Name: Frogkin
Monster.des: A child sized frog stands on 2 lags and holds a primitive spear in your direction.

Monster.Name: Imp
Monster.des: The imp grins nefariously as he charges his demonic magic.

Monster.Name: Goblin
Monster.description: A small goblin wiedling a dagger.

Monster.Name: Gnome
Monster.des: A stocky and muscled gnome blocks your path. 'Where you going big guy?'

Monster.Name: Monstrous Snapping Turtle
Monster.des: A large turtle eyes you hungrily and slowly crawls toward you.

Monster.Name: Cougar
Monster.des: A thickly muscled forest cat spits and hisses at you as it plans its next attack.

Monster.Name: Witch
Monster.des: An old woman blocks your path and pulls a bubbling concoction from under her cloak.

Monster.Name: Hobgoblin
Monster.des: An orange-hued hobgoblin readies it's sword and buckler.

Monster.Name: Highwayman
Monster.des: A darkly dressed man pulls a sword from his belt and demands your goods.

Monster.Name: Bandit
Monster.des: A scarred man brandishing a short-sword marches toward you.

Monster.Name: Rogue
Monster.des: A woman leaps from the bushes and attacks with multiple daggers.

Monster.Name: Boar
Monster.des: A boar with wicked tusks stamps the ground angrily as he begins to charge.

Monster.Name: Orc
Monster.des: A thickly muscled orc stands more than a head above you, drawing a claymore from his back.

Monster.Name: Bugbear
Monster.des: A creature of human and goblin blood walks from the bushes and looms over you with a club in hand.

Monster.Name: Troll
Monster.des: An enormous troll slowly approaches wielding a fallen trunk as a rudimentary weapon.

Monster.Name: Tiger
Monster.des: The tiger eyes you hungrily from the limb of a low tree.

Monster.Name: Elite Warrior
Monster.des: A heavily armored warrior draws twin blades as he accosts you.

Monster.Name: Grizzly Bear
Monster.des: A fearsome grizzly bear stands on its hind legs and roars at you.
